thread.title: Ocala skating coach faces additional sexual assault charges

author: @wcjb20
title: Ocala skating coach faces additional sexual assault charges
text:
Ocala skating coach faces additional sexual assault charges
OCALA, Fla. (WCJB) - TV20 has a new update on the case against a youth coach and skating rink owner in Ocala.
62-year-old Richard Hawkins, who people also know as “Spanky,” is already in custody for inappropriately touching a minor.
He now faces an additional charge of lewd and lascivious molestation of a minor after another victim came forward.
An arrest affidavit obtained by TV20 says Hawkins used his status as the new victim’s coach to manipulate him and tried to touch him inappropriately.
In February, we reported on Hawkins’ arrest following an investigation into his contact with a 16-year-old boy.
Hawkins was listed as a co-owner of “Skate Away South” in Ocala.
RELATED: Skating rink owner, youth coach arrested for sexual activity with 16-year-old in Ocala
